original_title: Second batch of Sri Lankans evacuated from Sudan arrive in Saudi Arabia
original_body_lines: The second batch of Sri Lankans who were evacuated from the Republic of Sudan arrived at the Jeddah King Faisal Naval Base in Saudi Arabia.
Accordingly, the group of six Sri Lankan nationals arrived at the naval base a shot while ago (28 April), and were received by Sri Lanka’s Acting Consul General in Jeddah.
